definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: Gisborne is a city where you can indulge in gourmet dining and wine tasting.
sentences.chinese: 吉斯伯恩是一個讓你縱情享受美酒佳餚的城市。

sentences.english: Sultriness is one of the most remarkable character of such desire.
sentences.chinese: 縱情聲色只是其中的傑出代表。

sentences.english: He knows pleasure but not disaster.
sentences.chinese: 只知縱情享樂，而不知他已面臨禍殃。

sentences.english: Revel in gender stereotypes while you still can.
sentences.chinese: 在你仍然能夠這樣做的時候縱情於性的模式化觀念。

sentences.english: In the past, that sort of overindulgence, and over-nutrition, used to be reserved for royalty.
sentences.chinese: 在過去，只有貴族才能縱情享受這些營養豐富的食品。

sentences.english: Rumour never disappears entirely once people have indulged her.
sentences.chinese: 人們一旦縱情於她，她就永遠不會徹底離開。

sentences.english: Indulge yourself and knowledge your partner in different lovemaking positions.
sentences.chinese: 讓你自己和對方都縱情於不同的體位。

sentences.english: Every bird on the boughs of the tree sings now to his heart and soul.
sentences.chinese: 樹枝上的小鳥們此時此刻縱情歌唱。

sentences.english: A band played salsa, and spectators danced wildly.
sentences.chinese: 樂隊演奏薩爾薩舞曲，觀衆們縱情跳舞。

sentences.english: Joy of the plenteous dinner, strong carouse and drinking?
sentences.chinese: 你瞭解那快樂是豐足的飲宴者，縱情狂歡的飲樂嗎？

sentences.english: At night, the village drum phase smell, people indulge in song and dance, boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 入夜，村寨鼓樂相聞，人們縱情歌舞，熱鬧非凡。

sentences.english: He holes up in the Hotel Rivera and plays at love and odd jobs.
sentences.chinese: 他棲身於里維拉旅館，縱情於聲色，遊戲於工作。

sentences.english: My hand drum to one's heart's content sings, sings the unhappy new life.
sentences.chinese: 我的手鼓縱情唱，唱不盡美好的新生活。

sentences.english: People who unrestrainedly engage in the five poisons are creating their own misery.
sentences.chinese: 縱情於此五毒者，正製造著自己的苦難。

sentences.english: They were scampering all over the beach picking up anything and everything that were thrown near them.
sentences.chinese: 他們在沙灘縱情奔跑，啃着別人扔給的東西。

definition: lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
refined and elegant attitude of mind
mundane world (in religious context)/this mortal coil
to urge on a horse using a whip or spurs
